Text: Access to EPA systems OATS and ETSPST Hello ATW User Group OATS WILL BE UNAVAILABLE DECEMBER Below is a message that was sent out by Alex Salpter of the EPA this morning The scheduled shut down of the OATS system should be planned on so that you dont find yourself in a last minute attempt to transfer allowances online and not be allowed As mentioned below this especially affects NOx compliance since December is the last day to transfer allowances in NATS Please review and prepare Best Regards Ona Papageorgiou ESP Dear Clients of the OnLine Allowance Transfer System OATS This to to let you know that the National Computer Center NCC at Research Triangle Park North Carolina will be moving its location and will be shut down between Saturday December and Monday December as follows OATS will be unavailable on Saturday December The mainframe used for submission of quarterly emission reports will not be available from Saturday December through Monday December OATS should be back in operation by Monday December and the mainframe should be back in operation by Tuesday January There is a small possibility that problems may arise and delay availability This is especially important to Authorized Account Representatives of accounts in the NOx Allowance Tracking System NATS since December is the NOx Budget Program NBP allowance transfer deadline December is the last day that a transfer of allowances of through vintage can be recorded via the OnLine Allowance Transfer System OATS It is also the last day for mailing a hardcopy Allowance Transfer form for NBP Annual Reconciliation purposes Please do not wait until the last minute to do online allowance transfers Should any problem arise in accessing OATS please make sure to mail a hardcopy NBP Allowance Transfer form by midnight December Please feel free to contact me at if you have any questions or problems Alex Salpeter Market Operations Branch Clean Air Markets Division
